title: Choosing ARAM is bugged/ work around
body:
Hey guys, just installed the profile update and noticed that I can't get into an ARAM game, as it's "not currently available"

https://imgur.com/wWLzhjI

If anyone else is coming across this as well, I found that doing this grants you access

- Select Summoner's Rift and confirm

- Go back to the choose gamemode screen.

You should be able to select ARAM now.

Bug report has been submitted

replies.body:
I've noticed that too - thanks for posting this one :)

Cheers
Mindstar
